briefTitle: Short and Long Term Effects of a Physical Therapy Program After Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Study of the Possible Sensory, Biomechanical, Cardiorespiratory and Quality of Life Adaptations Associated With Physical Therapy Rehabilitation in the Short and Long Term Postoperative of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Pressure pain threshold over the shoulder of breast cancer patients after a physical therapy rehabilitation program following the surgery.
